languages.text: {n}Лицо Хейнрикса немедленно каменеет, словно на нем и не было живых эмоций несколько секунд назад.{/n} "Благодарю за ясность, Лорд-капитан. Разрешите откланяться".
{n}Heinrix's face instantly turns to stone as if there never was any emotion on it to begin with.{/n} "Thank you for clarifying, Lord Captain. If I may take my leave now."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Хейнрикса немедленно каменеет, словно на нем и не было живых эмоций несколько секунд назад.{/n} "Благодарю за ясность, Лорд-капитан. Разрешите откланяться".

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの顔は瞬時に、あたかもそこに一度も感情が表れたことなどないかのように、石と化した。{/n}「はっきりさせてくれて感謝する。ロード・キャプテン。それでは失礼する」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face instantly turns to stone as if there never was any emotion on it to begin with.{/n} "Thank you for clarifying, Lord Captain. If I may take my leave now."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの顔は瞬時に、あたかもそこに一度も感情が表れたことなどないかのように、石と化した。{/n}「はっきりさせてくれて感謝する。ロード・キャプテン。それでは失礼する」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希的脸变得像石头一样冷硬，仿佛从一开始就没有任何感情。{/n}“感谢你的澄清，舰长大人。我现在准备告辞了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face instantly turns to stone as if there never was any emotion on it to begin with.{/n} "Thank you for clarifying, Lord Captain. If I may take my leave now."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希的脸变得像石头一样冷硬，仿佛从一开始就没有任何感情。{/n}“感谢你的澄清，舰长大人。我现在准备告辞了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les traits d'Heinrix se pétrifient subitement comme s'il n'avait jamais éprouvé la moindre émotion.{/n} « Merci d'avoir clarifié les choses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Avec votre permission, je vais prendre congé. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face instantly turns to stone as if there never was any emotion on it to begin with.{/n} "Thank you for clarifying, Lord Captain. If I may take my leave now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les traits d'Heinrix se pétrifient subitement comme s'il n'avait jamais éprouvé la moindre émotion.{/n} « Merci d'avoir clarifié les choses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Avec votre permission, je vais prendre congé. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Heinrix se petrifica al instante, como si nunca hubiera mostrado emoción alguna.{/n} «Gracias por la aclaración, Lord Capitán. Si me lo permite, debo irme».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face instantly turns to stone as if there never was any emotion on it to begin with.{/n} "Thank you for clarifying, Lord Captain. If I may take my leave now."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Heinrix se petrifica al instante, como si nunca hubiera mostrado emoción alguna.{/n} «Gracias por la aclaración, Lord Capitán. Si me lo permite, debo irme».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' Gesicht versteinert sofort, als hätte es darin niemals irgendein Gefühl gegeben.{/n} "Danke für die Klarstellung, Lord Captain. Ich darf mich verabschieden."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face instantly turns to stone as if there never was any emotion on it to begin with.{/n} "Thank you for clarifying, Lord Captain. If I may take my leave now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' Gesicht versteinert sofort, als hätte es darin niemals irgendein Gefühl gegeben.{/n} "Danke für die Klarstellung, Lord Captain. Ich darf mich verabschieden."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in yüzü, âdeta en başından beri hiçbir duygu barındırmıyormuş gibi aniden taş kesiliyor.{/n} "Açıklığa kavuşturduğun için teşekkür ederim Lord Kaptan. İzninle şimdi gidiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face instantly turns to stone as if there never was any emotion on it to begin with.{/n} "Thank you for clarifying, Lord Captain. If I may take my leave now."

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
